plot: Liron is a young Israeli man who wishes to be a fighter in a combat unit in the IDF, but is not allowed due to his medical profile. In the same week of the Haifa derby football match, Liron appeal the decision.
title: Green Ape
plot_es: Liron is a young Israeli man who wishes to be a fighter in a combat unit in the IDF, but is not allowed due to his medical profile. In the same week of the Haifa derby football match, Liron appeal the decision.
plot_en: Liron is a young Israeli man who wishes to be a fighter in a combat unit in the IDF, but is not allowed due to his medical profile. In the same week of the Haifa derby football match, Liron appeal the decision.
